long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: The wallet is currently in Beta and only works with the Mavryk Network Testnet. DO NOT send real funds to your address or any address you interact with on the Testnet.. You will lose access to those funds and they wonâ€™t be recoverable.

A Mavryk Wallet in your Browser
A secure wallet and gateway to the Mavryk Network blockchain. 

Unlock a realm of opportunities with the Mavryk Wallet â€” a user-centric solution empowering mainstream users to effortlessly navigate crypto, real-world assets, DeFi, and collectibles. Backed by industry-leading security measures, rest assured that your portfolio is not only instantly accessible but also safeguarded at your fingertips.

Whether you are an experienced user or brand new to blockchain, the Mavryk Wallet helps you connect to the decentralized web - a new internet. The Mavryk Wallet allows you to buy, send, spend, swap, and exchange your digital assets. Make payments to anyone, anywhere. Log into websites securely to trade assets, lend, borrow, play games, publish content, buy rare digital art, and so much more.

If youâ€™re already a Mavryk Wallet user, you can import your existing wallet. If youâ€™re a new user, we'll help you get started.

Because the Mavryk Wallet adds functionality to your traditional browser, we require permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always view our source code the way you would any Chrome extension, or on Github: https://github.com/mavryk-network/mavryk-wallet

Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14Op7Oij6fpBDVmw88B1DpSoTElAQIbNrGzdw1kUaRF4/
